pli-tv-bu-vb-sk71:6.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk71:6.2: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū pacchato gacchantā purato gacchantassa dhammaṃ desenti …
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk71:7.2: “Na pacchato gacchanto purato gacchantassa agilānassa dhammaṃ desessāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk71:8.1: Na pacchato gacchantena purato gacchantassa agilānassa dhammo desetabbo.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk71:8.2: Yo anādariyaṃ paṭicca pacchato gacchanto purato gacchantassa agilānassa dhammaṃ deseti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
